title: (x) Script/handwritten from a mineral water bottle - Black Jack {Patricia}
content:
This is taken from a mineral water bottle. The closest I found is P22 Corinthia and Paratype’s Liana. Any ideas ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811065027im_/http:/typophile.com/files/perla-eng.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811065027im_/http:/typophile.com/files/perla-ger.gif)

 [‹ French highway signage](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811065027/http:/typophile.com/node/19082 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "It’s played on our terms" grunge sans - Escalido {Chris K} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811065027/http:/typophile.com/node/19089 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cromy

comments.content:
Looks a lot like a stretched Black Jack, but some charactures (N and v) are different, possibly customized?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/black-jack/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811065027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/black-jack/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/black-jack/")
Very close. I think it’s customised. Thank you !
It’s a cute font, and FREE!!!
Already downloaded it. Best things are for free :) Thanks again.
